Turn on the camera, we're almost there. Take a look at yourself and put that funereal look away.
Turn on your ink camera. Use it as a mirror to take a good look at yourself, and do something about that dark expression first.
你是拿钱受雇的专业佣兵，专业的表情和神态也是我购买的服务。
あなたは雇われたプロの傭兵なの。傭兵としての表情と態度も、私が買ったサービスの一部よ。

You are a paid and hired professional mercenary, and a professional look and demeanor is a service I purchase as well.
You are a professional mercenary for hire. Your mercenary look and demeanor is part of the service I bought you.

신입은 볼을 때리며, 진지하게 스마트폰에 비친 자신을 바라보았다.
The rookie slapped her cheeks and looked seriously at herself in her cell phone.
The newcomer tapped his cheek and looked earnestly at his reflection in his phone.

일단 이야기를 들어봐. 질문이 있으면 그 다음에 해.

11719: 黑铜集团，在去年12月6日确实在Site-05展开过秘密军事行动。但是合作对象并不是这位所谓的伯勒乌先生。
黒銅グループは昨年12月6日、Site-05で秘密軍事作戦を行いました。しかし、協力相手はそのブロウ氏ではありません。
흑동 그룹은 작년 12월 6일, Site-05에서 비밀 군사 작전을 수행했습니다. 하지만 협력 상대는 그 블로우 씨가 아닙니다.

The Black Copper Group conducted a covert military operation at Site-05 last December 6. However, the cooperation partner is not that Mr. Brow.
我们与这位先生从来没有过任何经济往来。
我々はその方と金銭の取引を一切したことがありません。
우리는 그 분과 금전 거래를 단 한 번도 한 적이 없습니다.
We have never had any financial dealings with this gentleman.
We have never had any monetary transactions with that person.
秘密军事行动，对，秘密行动。秘密这个词知道是什么意思吗？就是不能告诉别人的事情。
秘密軍事作戦。そう、秘密の作戦だ。秘密という言葉の意味を知っているか？誰にも話してはいけないということだ。
비밀 군사 작전. 그래, 비밀 작전이야. 비밀이라는 단어의 의미를 알고 있나? 아무에게도 말해서는 안 된다는 거야.
Covert military operations. Yes, covert operations. Do you know what the word covert means? It means something you can't tell anyone about.
A secret military operation. Yes, a secret operation. Do you know what the word secret means? It means you can't tell anyone.
现在有个人拿着我们的秘密，顶着一个假名，叫我们去极乐都一趟，这怎么看都是阴谋，对吧？

Now there's a man with our secret, under a false name, asking us to make a trip to Elysium, and it's all a conspiracy when you look at it that way, isn't it?
Now someone is trying to get a hold of our secret and use a false name to trick us. This--#s a conspiracy no matter how you look at it, right?

小娘、お前は何を知っている？#n私たちが秘密作戦で使う手段をお前に使う前にすべて吐け。

Little girl, what things do you know? Speak up before we use ...... those tactics we use in covert operations on you -
Little girl, what do you know? Spit it all out before we use the means we use in our covert operations on you.
